name: Isolated: An Exploration of the Mind
name_original: Isolated: An Exploration of the Mind
description:
THIS GAME IS IN VERY EARLY ALPHA. Literally everything is subject to change.

Isolated: An Exploration of the Mind is an adventure about memory and secret. Your objective is to explore and pay attention, at the risk of having to start over.

Secrets are littered everywhere, and some are necessary to understand the questions that you'll be asked. Any and every floor space has the potential to be a secret, so take your time.

There is no planned final release, so enjoy the Demo updates as they come.

Since this is the early alpha build, there may be bugs. I don't know what they are, so please report any in the comments.
